snippet: Flynn Michael, co-founder of the New York Jedi club, leads weekly classes in how best to wield a lightsaber — but also, he says, how to be more confident and connect with one’s spirituality.
abstract: Character Study column on Flynn Michael, co-founder of the New York Jedi club who leads weekly classes in how best to wield a lightsaber; Michael says he also helps people become more confident and connect with their spirituality.
lead_paragraph: Flynn Michael, co-founder of the New York Jedi club, leads weekly classes in how best to wield a lightsaber — but also, he says, how to be more confident and connect with one’s spirituality.

headline.seo: Flynn Michael Trains New Jedis in the Ways of the Force
headline.main: Training New Jedis in the Force
headline.print_headline: Training New Jedis In the Force
